TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlRoleProvider extends System.Web.Security.RoleProvider

summary.span: Manages storage of role membership information for an ASP.NET application in a SQL Server database.

span.span: Manages storage of role membership information for an ASP.NET application in a SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別由和類別提供 ASP.NET 應用程式使用 SQL Server 資料庫的角色管理服務。This class is used by the and classes to provide role-management services for an ASP.NET application using a SQL Server database. 您可以使用角色管理您的應用程式指定不同的層級的授權。You can use role management to specify different levels of authorization for your application. 若要使用類別，您必須先建立所使用的 SQL Server 資料庫。To use the class, you must first create the SQL Server database used by the . 若要建立所使用的資料庫類別，執行`aspnet_regsql.exe`可執行檔位於 C:\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\`versionNumber`資料夾，並指定`-Ar`選項 (例如， `aspnet_regsql.exe -Ar`)。To create the database used by the class, run the `aspnet_regsql.exe` executable found in the C:\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\ `versionNumber` folder and specify the `-Ar` option (for example, `aspnet_regsql.exe -Ar`). 建立的資料庫稱為 Aspnetdb。The database created is called Aspnetdb. 或者，執行 aspnet_regsql.exe 提取 GUI 組態模式，然後選擇要設定所有的 ASP.NET 功能。Alternatively, run aspnet_regsql.exe to pull up the GUI configuration mode and choose to configure all ASP.NET features. 如果角色提供者的連接字串來使用整合式的安全性設定，ASP.NET 應用程式的處理序帳戶必須具有權限可以連線到 SQL Server 資料庫。If the role provider is configured with a connection string that uses integrated security, the process account of the ASP.NET application must have rights to connect to the SQL Server database. Machine.config 檔案設有名為 Languagekeyword>aspnetsqlprovider< 連接到本機電腦上的 SQL Server 執行個體。The Machine.config file is configured with a instance named AspNetSqlProvider that connects to the SQL Server on the local machine. 您可以使用的提供者，這個執行個體或指定您自己的 Web.config 檔案中為 ASP.NET 應用程式。You can use this instance of the provider, or specify your own in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. 若要使用 Languagekeyword>aspnetsqlprovider< 執行個體，指定做為 Languagekeyword>aspnetsqlprovider<`defaultProvider`組態中。To use the AspNetSqlProvider instance, specify AspNetSqlProvider as the `defaultProvider` in your configuration. 您可以設定使用相同的資料庫和使用者資訊作為才能使用單一資料庫的驗證和授權資訊。You can configure the to use the same database and user information as the in order to use a single database for authentication and authorization information. 若要使用的成員資格和角色資訊的相同資料庫，執行 aspnet_regsql.exe 可執行檔並安裝成員資格功能。To use the same database for membership and role information, run the aspnet_regsql.exe executable and install the membership feature. 然後，在您設定兩個指定相同的連接字串您和執行個體。Then, specify the same connection string in your configuration for both your and instances. 還要確定這兩個提供者執行個體都具有相同設定。Also ensure that both provider instances are configured with the same . ## Examples 下列範例示範設定為使用 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案物件和。The following example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application configured to use a object and the . 項目被設定為只允許系統管理員角色中的 已驗證的使用者存取。The element is configured to only allow access to authenticated users in the Administrators role. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式由 ASP.NET 呼叫來建立的執行個體類別做為應用程式的組態中指定。The constructor is called by ASP.NET to create an instance of the class as specified in the configuration for the application. 這個建構函式不是從您的程式碼使用。This constructor is not intended to be used from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法透過呼叫一或多個使用者與 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫中的一個或多個角色建立關聯的類別。The method is called by the class to associate one or more users with one or more roles in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 這個方法會呼叫， ， ，和方法類別。This method is called by the , , , and methods of the class. 會在呼叫期間執行資料庫更新方法在交易內進行。The database updates that are performed during the call to the method are made within a transaction. 如果發生錯誤，例如使用者名稱已在指定的角色，會回復交易，會執行任何更新。If an error is encountered, such as a user name that is already in a specified role, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed. 如果搭配使用，而且其中一個指定的使用者名稱不存在資料庫中，使用者名稱將會自動加入到資料庫。If the is being used with the , and one of the specified user names does not exist in the database, the user name will be automatically added to the database. 使用者名稱和角色名稱不能包含逗號。User names and role names cannot contain commas. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將一個或多個使用者加入角色，或從角色移除使用者。The following code example adds one or more users to a role or removes a user from a role. 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the application for which to store and retrieve role information.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application for which to store and retrieve role information.

value.span: 用來儲存及擷取角色資訊的應用程式名稱。

span.span: The name of the application for which to store and retrieve role information.
The default is the property value for the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正由與不同的應用程式的使用者和角色。The is used by the to associate users and roles with different applications. 這可讓多個應用程式使用相同的資料庫來儲存使用者和角色資訊而不重複的使用者名稱或角色名稱之間發生衝突。This enables multiple applications to use the same database to store user and role information without running into conflicts between duplicate user names or role names. 多個 ASP.NET 應用程式可以使用相同的資料庫，藉由指定相同值的屬性。Multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same database by specifying the same value in the property. 屬性可以設定以程式設計的方式，或是可以設定以宣告方式在 Web 應用程式使用的組態檔中`applicationName`屬性。The property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application using the `applicationName` attribute. 如果未指定值`applicationName`Web 應用程式組態檔中的屬性則目前屬性值物件使用。If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file for the Web application, then the property value for the current object is used. > [!CAUTION] > 因為所有由提供服務的要求會使用單一預設角色提供者執行個體物件，您可以有多個要求同時執行，而且嘗試設定屬性值。Because a single default role provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 屬性不是執行緒安全的多個寫入，且變更屬性值可能會導致非預期的行為，應用程式的多個使用者。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 建議您避免撰寫程式碼，讓使用者設定屬性除非必要，否則。It is recommended that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the property unless you must. 應用程式的範例設定屬性可能需要為系統管理的應用程式管理角色的多個應用程式的資料。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages role data for multiple applications. 這類應用程式應該在單一使用者應用程式並不是 Web 應用程式。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application. ## Examples 下列範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式的執行個體和設定屬性`MyApplication`。It specifies the application's instance and sets the property to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法透過呼叫類別來建立 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫中的角色。The method is called by the class to create a role in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 角色名稱的最大長度為 256 個字元。The maximum length for the role name is 256 characters. 角色名稱不區分大小寫。Role names are not case-sensitive. 角色名稱中不允許逗號。Commas are not allowed in role names. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會在資料庫中建立新的角色。The following code example creates a new role in the database. 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/createrolecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/createrolevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法透過呼叫刪除從 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫角色的類別。The method is called by the class to delete a role from the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 刪除角色時，也會從資料庫刪除與該角色相關聯的使用者清單。When a role is deleted, the list of users associated with that role is also deleted from the database. 不會影響資料庫中的使用者資訊。The user information in the database is not affected. 如果`throwOnPopulatedRole`是`true`則會擲回例外狀況，角色將不會刪除，如果角色由`roleName`參數有一個或多個成員。If `throwOnPopulatedRole` is `true`, then an exception will be thrown and the role will not be deleted if the role identified by the `roleName` parameter has one or more members. 如果`throwOnPopulatedRole`是`false`，則它是空的或不會刪除該角色。If `throwOnPopulatedRole` is `false`, then the role will be deleted whether it is empty or not. ## Examples 下列範例會從資料庫刪除角色。The following example deletes a role from the database. 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/deleterolecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/deleterolevb.aspx#2)]

span.span: A string array containing the names of all the users where the user name matches and the user is a member of the specified role.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法透過呼叫類別，並傳回在角色中的使用者清單，其中使用者名稱包含相符項目提供`usernameToMatch`設定`applicationName`。The method is called by the class and returns a list of users in a role where the user name contains a match of the supplied `usernameToMatch` for the configured `applicationName`. 符合使用者名稱搜尋`usernameToMatch`參數值使用 LIKE 關鍵字，並支援 SQL Server 萬用字元。The searches for a user name that matches the `usernameToMatch` parameter value using the LIKE keyword and supports SQL Server wildcard characters. 例如，如果`usernameToMatch`參數設定為"user1"，則會傳回具有使用者名稱的使用者稱為"user1"的成員資格資訊，如果存在的話。For example, if the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user1", then membership information for the user with the user name of "user1" is returned, if it exists. 如果`usernameToMatch`參數設定為"user %"，則會傳回成員資格資訊的使用者使用的使用者名稱為"user1"、"user2"、"user_admin"，依此類推。If the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user%", then membership information for users with the user name of "user1", "user2", "user_admin", and so on are returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用根據使用者輸入的方法，以顯示角色成員資格。The following code example uses the method to display role membership based on user input. 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法透過呼叫類別來擷取在 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫中的所有角色的清單。The method is called by the class to retrieve a list of all the roles in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法，以取得應用程式角色的清單，以及繫結至結果控制項。The following code example uses the method to get the list of roles for an application and bind the results to a control. 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/createrolecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/createrolevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法透過呼叫類別和方法屬性來決定使用者是否為 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫中的角色相關聯(Web.config)。The method is called by the class and the method of the property to determine whether a user is associated with a role in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會以程式設計方式檢查登入的使用者是否在系統管理員角色中，然後才允許使用者檢視的使用者角色。The following code example programmatically checks to see whether the logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view user roles. 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法透過呼叫從 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫中的一個或多個角色移除一或多個使用者的類別。The method is called by the class to remove one or more users from one or more roles in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 這個方法會呼叫， ， ，和方法類別。This method is called by the , , , and methods of the class. 會在呼叫期間執行資料庫更新會在交易內進行。The database updates that are performed during the call to are made within a transaction. 如果發生錯誤，例如不存在的使用者名稱或使用者名稱已在指定的角色，則會復原交易，會執行任何更新。If an error is encountered, such as a user name that does not exist or a user name that is already in a specified role, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed. 使用者名稱和角色名稱不能包含逗號。User names and role names cannot contain commas. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將一個或多個使用者加入角色，或從角色移除使用者。The following code example adds one or more users to a role or removes a user from a role. 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法透過呼叫類別以決定是否在 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫角色名稱。The method is called by the class to determine whether a role name exists in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法來判斷角色名稱是否已存在於之前建立的角色。The following code example uses the method to determine whether a role name already exists before creating the role. 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
